item.title: Some softwares I use everyday
item.description: Some softwares I use 1 OS Ubuntu 22.04 Microsoft Windows 7 & 10 (seldom) 2 Web browser Google chrome Extendsion: Google translate Google docs offline Firefox Opera 3 IDEs VS Code Code-Server - Browser based VS Code IDE 4 Database clients DBeaver MySQL client console PSQL console 5 Chat clients Telegram Zalo Skype 6 Online services Google suite: https://gmail.com DrawIO Dropbox Project management Trello - Jira: https://www.
